altername_name: Tricky-Quiky-Games: Die Suche Nach Den Verschollenen Seiten
name: Tricky Quiky Games: Die Suche nach den verschollenen Seiten
overview: Tricky Quiky Games: Die Suche nach den verschollenen Seiten is a promotional adventure action game by Nestlé, that was given free in Nesquik cereal packages. The player must take control of Quicky the Nesquik bunny to recover pieces of the recipe to Nesquik cereal. The player must travel through a number of chocolate filled lands including forests, tropical jungles, underground, winterscapes, and the mountains. Armed with a small gun which shoots small red bullets, the player has a health bar represented by a bottle of chocolate milk, and takes damage when striking enemies.
